cards.rules_text:
Whenever this creature attacks, surveil 2. [i](To surveil 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)[/i]
{2}{U}, Sacrifice an artifact: Draw a card.
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If it's an artifact creature, it gains indestructible until end of turn.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
When an artifact creature or Vehicle you control attacks, exile enchanted creature.

Flying
Galvanize [i](When this creature enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature or Vehicle. If you put a +1/+1 counter on a Vehicle this way, it gains haste until end of turn.)[/i]
Return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If it's a Vehicle, it becomes an artifact creature.

Whenever another artifact creature or Vehicle you control attacks, choose one — 
• That creature or Vehicle gains first strike until end of turn.
• Untap this creature.

When this creature enters, create a Junk token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
Whenever you sacrifice a Junk, this creature explores. [i](Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]

Salvage {2}{W} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard by sacrificing two artifacts in addition to paying its other costs.)[/i]
Flying, first strike, lifelink
Crew 4
At the beginning of your end step, if you've sacrificed an artifact this turn, create a 1/1 green Elemental creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on target creature or artifact you control.

Flying
When this Vehicle enters, create a Junk token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
Whenever you sacrifice an artifact, you may put a +1/+1 counter on this Vehicle. If you don't, create a tapped Treasure token. Activate only once per turn.
Crew 2

Destroy target creature, artifact or enchantment. Its controller creates two Junk tokens. [i](They're artifacts with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
This creature crews Vehicles as though its power were 2 greater.

Ward {2} [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)[/i]
[i]Paradox[/i] — Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

Affinity for artifacts [i](This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)[/i]
When this Vehicle enters, create a Junk token and draw a card. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
Crew 2

When this creature enters, create two 1/1 colorless Drone artifact creature tokens with flying.
At the beginning of your upkeep, surveil 2. If you put an artifact card in your graveyard this way, it gains salvage {2}{U} until end of turn.

When this creature enters, you gain 2 life.
When this creature leaves the battlefield, draw a card.

Until end of turn, target creature or Vehicle becomes an artifact creature with base power and toughness 4/5.
Draw a card.

Flying
As long as you control four or more artifacts, this creature has hexproof. [i](It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)[/i]
Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Draw a card.
Counter target permanent spell. If it's an artifact spell, each player draws a card.

{3}{U}, {T}: Choose one —
• Create a 1/1 colorless Drone creature token with flying.
• Create a Junk token.
• Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

Enchant artifact or creature
When Malfunction enters, tap enchanted permanent.
Enchanted permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

Dash {2}{B} [i](You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)[/i]
Whenever this creature attacks, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

Dash {1}{B} [i](You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)[/i]
When this creature enters, create a Junk token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]

Menace
Whenever this creature attacks, if you've sacrificed an artifact this turn, it explores. [i](Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]

Salvage {2}{B}{B} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard by sacrificing two artifacts in addition to paying its other costs.)[/i]
If you cast this Vehicle for its salvage cost, it becomes an artifact creature.
When this Vehicle enters, you may exile a creature card from your graveyard. When you do, put X +1/+1 counters on target creature you control, where X is the exiled creature's power.
Crew 2

{2}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Create two Junk tokens. [i](They're artifacts with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
Sacrifice three Junk: Draw a card.

Whenever another creature you control leaves the battlefield, create a Junk token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]

Whenever a creature you control leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on this artifact.
{2}{B}: This artifact becomes a 0/0 Horror creature in addition to its other types and gains menace until end of turn.

This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets a creature card with mana value 3 or less.
Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. You gain 2 life.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.
Draw two cards and create a Junk token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]

Lifelink
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice an artifact you control. If you do, return this creature from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Destroy target creature.

Surveil 2.
Choose target artifact card in your graveyard. It gains salvage {2}{B} until the end of your next turn. [i](You may cast that card from your graveyard by sacrificing two artifacts in addition to paying its other costs.)[/i]

Dash {1}{R} [i](You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)[/i]
When this creature enters, it deals 1 damage to each opponent.
[i]Paradox[/i] — Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, this creature deals 1 damage to target player. Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, this creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

Flying
{T}, Sacrifice this creature: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
{T}, Sacrifice this creature: Add {R}{R}.

First strike
[i]Paradox[/i] — Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for that copy. Activate only once per turn. [i](A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)[/i]

Trample
Galvanize [i](When this creature enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature or Vehicle. If you put a +1/+1 counter on a Vehicle this way, it gains haste until end of turn.)[/i]

Flying
Whenever this Vehicle attacks, you may exile the top two cards of your library. You may play those cards until your next end step. At the beginning of your next end step, this Vehicle deals 1 damage to each opponent for each of those cards that are still exiled.
Crew 2 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

When this artifact enters, attach it to target creature you control.
Equipped creature gets +2/+0.
{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
Equip {1}{R}

Choose one — 
• When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
• Create a Junk token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]

[i]Paradox[/i] — If you've cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand this turn, target Vehicle you control becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.
Up to two target creatures each get +1/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.

Ember Expulsion deals 3 damage to any target.
Salvage {R} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard by sacrificing two artifacts in addition to paying its other costs.)[/i]

Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Change the target of target spell or ability with a single target.
• One or two target creatures can't block this turn.

Trample
Whenever you put a card from your library into your graveyard or exile, put a +1/+1 counter on this Vehicle.
Crew 3 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

{T}: Add {G}.
[i]Paradox[/i] — {T}: Add one mana of any color. Activate only if you've cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand this turn.

When this creature enters, create a Junk token.
[i]Paradox[/i] — Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.

Reach
When this creature enters, choose one —
• This creature explores. [i](Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
• Create a Junk token.

Salvage {1}{G}{G} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard by sacrificing two artifacts in addition to paying its other costs.)[/i]
When this creature enters, search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

When this creature enters, create a 1/1 green Elemental creature token.
[i]Paradox[/i] — Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, target creature you control explores.

Enchant land
When Grafted Growth enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature or Vehicle you control.
Enchanted land has “{T}: Add two mana of any one color.”

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has trample.
When this enchantment is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, create a Junk token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]

Deathtouch
When this creature dies, create two 1/1 green Elemental creature tokens.
{T}, Sacrifice an artifact you control: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Activate only as a sorcery.

Ward {2} [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)[/i]
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {2}{G}. When you do, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. That creature gains trample until end of turn.

{T}: Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
Crew 2 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Junk Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

Salvage {U} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard by sacrificing two artifacts in addition to paying its other costs.)[/i]

Choose target creature or Vehicle you control. If you cast this spell during your main phase, the creature or Vehicle you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.
